gobblin.runtime.instance

Class DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.instance.DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, GobblinInstanceDriver, JobLifecycleListenersContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardGobblinInstanceDriver

    public class DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements GobblinInstanceDriver
    A default implementation of GobblinInstanceDriver. It accepts already instantiated JobCatalog, JobSpecMonitorFactory, JobSpecScheduler, JobExecutionLauncher. It is responsibility of the caller to manage those (e.g. start, shutdown, etc.)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl.JobSpecListener
      Listens to changes in the Job catalog and schedules/un-schedules jobs.

      • registerWeakJobLifecycleListener

        public void registerWeakJobLifecycleListener(JobLifecycleListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: JobLifecycleListenersContainer
        Like JobLifecycleListenersContainer.registerJobLifecycleListener(JobLifecycleListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using JobLifecycleListenersContainer.unregisterJobLifecycleListener(JobLifecycleListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakJobLifecycleListener in interface JobLifecycleListenersContainer
